UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Fatty acid modified-antimicrobial peptide analogues with potent antimicrobial activity and topical therapeutic efficacy against Staphylococcus hyicus.
Literature.Author: Liu H, Yang N, Teng D, Mao R, Hao Y, Ma X, Wang X, Wang J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:<2% Hemolysis=256 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:3.9% Killing=256 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:LC50=4028 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CVCC 546(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus hyicus NCTC 10350(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus hyicus ACCC 61734(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli CVCC 21530(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli CVCC 195(MIC=8µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum CVCC 1789(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum CVCC 1802(MIC=16µg/ml)
